name: Single-family homes
description: Detached homes designed for single families, offering privacy and ample space for residents. Often feature yards or gardens and are typically located in residential neighborhoods.

name: Townhouses
description: Multi-level residences that share walls with adjacent units, providing a balance between the space of a single-family home and the convenience of a condominium. Commonly found in urban and suburban areas.

name: Apartments
description: Multi-unit buildings with individual rental units, ranging from studio apartments to large penthouses. Ideal for individuals or families seeking flexibility and convenience in urban settings.

name: Student housing
description: Residential accommodations tailored specifically for students attending colleges or universities. Offer various options such as dormitories, apartments, or shared houses, often located near campus.

name: Senior living communities
description: Communities designed to cater to the needs of seniors, offering amenities and services tailored to an active and independent lifestyle or assisted living. Provide social activities, healthcare services, and security.

name: Vacation rentals
description: Short-term rental properties available for vacationers, offering an alternative to hotels or resorts. Range from beachfront villas to mountain cabins, providing comfort and convenience during holiday stays.
